title: Ghost Security Group
extract: Ghost Security, also known as GhostSec, is a self-described "vigilante" group that was formed to attack ISIS websites that promote Islamic extremism. ... The group uses social media hashtags like #GhostSec - #GhostSecurity or #OpISIS to promote its activities.
extract_html: Ghost Security, also known as GhostSec, is a self-described "vigilante" group that was formed to attack ISIS websites that promote Islamic extremism. ... The group uses social media hashtags like #GhostSec - #GhostSecurity or #OpISIS to promote its activities.
